short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate me will improve your productivity by helping you quickly find your history of page navigations in a website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will keep track of the web pages you visited within a website. You can view the list of pages you browsed in the current website in the order you visited. This makes it easy to go back and open a page that you already browsed without remembering it's title or the URL. It provides a simple yet powerful search functionality too.
